BIG SKIES FRONTEND FLUTTER.desc: Front End Development - Consumes UI element definitions from ui-element-coordinator via MQTT

mqtt_integration.framework_specific: Flutter widget mappings (Card, Column, ElevatedButton, etc.)

BIG SKIES FRONTEND UNITY.desc: Front End Development - Consumes UI element definitions from ui-element-coordinator via MQTT

mqtt_integration.framework_specific: Unity UI component mappings (Canvas, Panel, Button, etc.)

BIG SKIES FRONTEND PythonGTK.desc: Front End Development - Consumes UI element definitions from ui-element-coordinator via MQTT

mqtt_integration.framework_specific: GTK widget mappings (Gtk.Frame, Gtk.Button, Gtk.Grid, etc.)

BIG SKIES FRONTEND MFC.desc: Front End Development - Consumes UI element definitions from ui-element-coordinator via MQTT

mqtt_integration.framework_specific: MFC control mappings (CDialog, CButton, CStatic, etc.)

BIG SKIES FRONTEND Qt.desc: Front End Development - Consumes UI element definitions from ui-element-coordinator via MQTT

mqtt_integration.framework_specific: Qt widget mappings (QGroupBox, QPushButton, QGridLayout, etc.)

BIG SKIES FRONTEND WPF.desc: Front End Development - Consumes UI element definitions from ui-element-coordinator via MQTT

mqtt_integration.framework_specific: WPF control mappings (GroupBox, Button, StackPanel, etc.)

BIG SKIES BACKEND.desc: BACKEND SERVICES AND API COORDINATION ENGINE

BUS.desc: MESSAGE BUS ARCHITECTURE - mqtt exchange format JSON

message-coordinator.desc: Message Bus and Interchange Message Coordinator

api_message-setup-wizard.desc: Responsible for configuration wizard ui API

api_service-setup-wizard.desc: Responsible for configuration wizard ui API

security-coordinator.desc: Responsible for Coordinating Applcation Security Model, Roles, Groups, Accounts, Permissions, SSL Configuration (Let's Encrypt)

acct_security_engine.desc: Responsible for all user,group, role based permissions management

tls_security_engine.desc: Responsible for coordinating all tls/ssl configuration, obtaining certificates for all application requirements

api_security-setup-wizard.desc: Responsible for configuration wizard ui API

ascom-engine.desc: Responsible for ascom-alpaca configurations on a per telescope basis. ALL ASCOM ALPACA ENDPOINTS SHOULD BE SUPPORTED

api_ascom-setup-wizard.desc: Responsible for configuration wizard ui API ALL ASCOM ALPACA ENDPOINTS SHOULD BE SUPPORTED

api_telescope-setup-wizard.desc: Responsible for configuration wizard ui API: Interfaces with api_ascom-setup-wizard

ui-element-coordinator.desc: Responsible for ui element tracking, provisioning ui from plugins - scans plugin ui API to extend base ui. Supports multi-framework widget mappings (GTK, Flutter, MFC, Qt, WPF, Unity, Blazor)

ui_element_registry.desc: Maintains registry of UI elements with framework-specific widget mappings

api_functions.ListUIElementsByFramework: Returns elements with specific framework mappings
api_functions.GetFrameworkMapping: Retrieves framework-specific widget mapping for element
api_functions.GetSupportedFrameworks: Lists all frameworks with at least one element mapping

plugin-coordinator.desc: Responsible for all aspects of plugin management, installation, verfication, versioning, updates, removal etc. tracked by instance guid

svc_plugin-scanner.desc: Responsible for scanning plugin configurations and verifying plugin validations

data-store-coordinator.desc: Responsible for all aspects of data storage management, installation, verfication, versioning, updates, removal etc. PostGresSqL

svc_database-manager.desc: Responsible for all database configurations and verifying configurations, data management, backups, restores, etc.
